entry.title: Mobs are Live!
entry.summary:
Animals and monsters now inhabit Liberty Land

During the day, you will encounter some frindly animals. You can be frinds with them, or you can kill them. I don't care either way. But be careful though! During the night and in the dark, there are monsters. You can't be friends with them, they will try to kill you.

Craft your sword and get ready to fight!

entry.title: Worldmap is Live!
entry.summary: I am very happy to announce, we now have an amazing interactive map of Liberty Land which you can see at maps.ayntest.net.

entry.title: Planned Maintenance at 2014-09-04 05:00 UTC
entry.summary: Our super awesome admin, sol, needs to do some h4x0r computer magic on our game server to make it more amazing. As a result, the server will be down for approximately 3 hours starting at 05:00 UTC tomorrow, 2014-09-04.

entry.title: some downtime
entry.summary: We are experiencing some problems with our db. We're not going anywhere, but it might take a while.
